text: The Wright Endeavour was a body of a bus. It had a high-floor. It was made from from 1992 to 1993 by Wrightbus. The Wright Endeavour was built on the Leyland Tiger chassis. In 1992, Ulsterbus ordered 25 Leyland Tiger Wright Endeavours. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Coaches (bus) Endeavour
title: Wright Endeavour
